Parameters:
a -
valueButton -
valueListener - if a null or empty -> the listener is not created
isValueBinding - a true if valueButton and / or valueListener are valueBinding
methodForButton -
methodForListener - if a null or empty -> the listener is not created
styleClassForLi -
Returns:
HtmlTag : LI including (or not) a command Button with his Listener.
